comment: Politics is literally about social control of public spaces. Yet our movement's so incredibly stupid, on a level that's hard to fathom, that there was an argument over whether or not we should contest public spaces at all and we all agreed not to. Dildo McInnes deserves to win, and I'm happy for him and his project.
amr:
# ::snt Politics is literally about social control of public spaces. Yet our movement's so incredibly stupid, on a level that's hard to fathom, that there was an argument over whether or not we should contest public spaces at all and we all agreed not to. Dildo McInnes deserves to win, and I'm happy for him and his project.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / concern-02

            :ARG1 (c2 / control-01
                  :ARG1 (s / space
                        :ARG1-of (p2 / public-02))
                  :mod (s2 / social))

      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01

                  :op1 (s3 / stupid
                        :domain (m2 / movement-07
                              :ARG0 (w / we))
                        :degree (ii / incredible)
                        :manner (l2 / level
                              :ARG1-of (f / fathom-01
                                    :ARG1-of (h / hard-02))))
                  :op2 (a2 / agree-01

                        :ARG1 (c4 / contest-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (s4 / space
                                    :ARG1-of (p3 / public-02))
                              :mod (a3 / at-all)))
                  :op3 a2
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (c5 / contest-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 s4)))
      :snt3 (a4 / and
            :op1 (d / deserve-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Dildo"
                              :op2 "McInnes"))
                  :ARG1 (w2 / win-01
                        :ARG0 p4))
            :op2 (h2 / happy-01
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG2 (a5 / and
                        :op1 p4
                        :op2 (p5 / project
                              :poss p4)))))

comment: Hey there, homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thanks
